title: Azure Pipelines Agent for Linux
description: Downloads and installs the Azure Pipelines agent, registers with the specified Azure DevOps Services organization, and adds the VM to the specified agent pool.

adoAccount.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization to add the agent to. This is the value in your Azure DevOps URL: e.g. 'myorg' in https://dev.azure.com/myorg.

adoPat.description: A personal access token with permissions to add agents. It will only be used to register the agent. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/agents/v2-linux?view=azure-devops for more information

adoPool.description: The agent pool this build agent should be added to.

agentPath.description: Path where agent is stored. Any storage space used by the agent is in a subdirectory of the agent path.

agentName.description: A unique name identifying this agent. If not specified, it defaults to the hostname of the machine running the agent
